open._help: Connect to a transport network. When initialized the transport returns a handle.
open._this: When entering no other information, the possible protocols are listed.

_ref._this: Target group or host to connect to.
Specify the handle of the transport to close.

info._help: Get information about an active transport.

_ref._this: Specify the handle of the transport to query.

send._help: Send a message over an active transport.

_ref._this: Message to send must be a string. A message ID is returned.

list._help: List active transports, endpoints or peers.
list.peers: Peers across all networks are listed.
list.peersURIs: Peers enpoint URIs across all networks are listed.
